Text: Another day, another update for Fallout New Vegas, of course brought to us by top scene group SKIDROW. This update solve the autosave/preference problem, ENJOY.
No RAR file thanx a bunch!

So is everyone avoiding this update ? I've been reading on some sites that it fucks things up even worse. Any feedback from people who updated the Skidrow release ?

Everytime I start the game, it crahses. no clue why.

I don't know what's going on with other people, but after this update [I didn't bother with update 1, as it's included with this one], the game works just fine for me.  The DLC all loaded, saves all work, & after 4 or so hours of playing it today, I've not had a single crash, or even a glitch, for that matter.

If it helps, I'm running Win7 x64, an i7 860, and a Geforce 470GTX with the 260.89 drivers.  The game is set on "Ultra" settings with everything maxed out. I did update my Dx with the included runtime as the instructions stated.  Good luck & happy gaming.
@Godsize: how did you get directx to downgrade? I'm Win7 x64 as well, but try as I might I can't get the included version to install.
Huh. Never mind, seems I got the installer to work after all. If anyone else has this problem, the fix is stupidly simple...just run it in compatibility mode for XP >.
not trusted
i wait for Mbb15 or AItb

@journe - DirectX won't downgrade. The directx runtime installer just checks your PC for needed DX9 files and adds them as necessary. 

Also, nVidia just released new drivers this week that fix a few issues with FO:NV.  They also seem to have fixed some crashing issues with FO3 [re-playing that before getting heavy into Vegas].
Worked for me without any problems.

For anyone still getting crashes after installing this update - go to fallout new vegas nexus and search out the 'perf fix' mod.

It sorts out loads of tech problems, crashing, stuttering etc

I downloaded this fix and it pretty fixes everything and includes all DLC specials

And I also apply my own personal fix to make the game compatible to my system

Credits goes from: http://geekmontage.com/texts/fallout-new-vegas-game-fixes-crashes-audio-issues-lag-saving/

"Game Lagging / Stuttering From Direct-X?"
This is the same fix as the above DLL crash fix method. Some of you may not be crashing from not having this DLL, but instead may be suffering lag and game stuttering.

1. Download the dx9d9.dll: http://www.newvegasnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=34778 (Nexus)
2. Put the file in your game folder
